bibl.title: Egypt in the First Millennium AD. Perspectives from New Fieldwork

series.title: British Museum Publications on Egypt and Sudan

bibl.note: nombr. figg. n./bl. et 68 pll. coul.

Proceedings of the 21st Annual Egyptology Colloquium at the British Museum in July 2012. - Pp. xi-xiv: Dominic Rathbone, Preface; - 1-20: E.R.O'C., Settlements and Cemeteries in Late Antique Egypt: An Introduction. - I. Settlements. - II. Cemeteries. - III. Settling rock-cut tombs and quarries. - IV. Temple - church - mosque.
bibl.seg: Elisabeth R. O'Connell (ed.), Egypt in the First Millennium AD. Perspectives from New Fieldwork = British Museum Publications on Egypt and Sudan. 2.
Leuven - Paris - Walpole, MA, Peeters, 2014, 4°, xiv-230 pp., nombr. figg. n./bl. et 68 pll. coul. ISBN 978-90-429-3071-1. €95.
